ack.title: Acknowledgments
ack.p:
The authors wish to thank D. Adalsteinsson and P. Schultz for multiple discussions of the capabilities of DataGraph software used to create the figures, and Kennie Merz for the suggestion to add the analysis of the HIV/AIDS pandemic. The authors also acknowledge support from the
10.13039/100000002 National Institutes of Health
(grant 1U01CA207160) and Biomedical Data Translator Initiative of National Center for Advancing Translational Sciences, National Institutes of Health (grants OT3TR002020, OT2R002514).
